subject: Automobile Racing
Domestic Violence
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Busch, sponsors, officials and fans are all awaiting word regarding whether he will be charged, but Nascar is allowing him to continue racing without penalty in the meantime.
